list_definition.definition: something difficult to carry or withstand

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He carried a heavy burden up the hill
The ox is sometimes a beast of burden (= an animal that carries things).

list_definition.definition: to put a responsibility etc on (someone)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She was burdened with various troubles.
